pathAssistantSteps.info:
• Once the Lead is qualified, click on the Convert button in the upper right hand corner to convert the lead to a Prospect.
  • If the Lead cannot be qualified and would like to remove the Lead record, click on the "Unqualified" stage and click on "Mark Status as complete".
  • Or you can leave your Lead in an "Open" status until further definitive action can be taken.
